title: Data Mining
ziele: Students are enabled to apply data mining methods and techniques to recognize patterns that reveal potentially unknown knowledge from integrated and cleaned organizational data bases. They know the phases of the data mining process, important domains and typical problems of data and Web mining, and are familiar with common data mining tools.
lehrinhalte: Data mining process (KDD - knowledge discovery in data bases); data mining techniques: clustering, classification, association rules, generalization; data mining applications; data mining tools; neural networks; genetic algorithms, case studies and practical scenarios, with a particular focus on Web mining.
beurteilung:
<sup><acronym title='Unfortunately this information is not available in english.'>(*)</acronym></sup>Vorlesung: Klausur 
Übung: Ausarbeitung, Präsentation und Diskussion von Fallbeispielen und Spezialthemen
sonstiges: <sup><acronym title='Unfortunately this information is not available in english.'>(*)</acronym></sup>Vorlesung und Übung können auch als Kombinierte Lehrveranstaltung angeboten werden.
